title: Director of Media Relations - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Director of Media Relations Posted/Updated: 10-08-2015 Brief Job Description: Coordinates all aspects of sports information including media relations and publications. Assists with game operations and management including press row operations. Oversees website...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
